com.opensymphony.xwork2.config

Interface BeanSelectionProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationProvider, ContainerProvider, PackageProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanSelectionProvider, DefaultBeanSelectionProvider

    public interface BeanSelectionProvider
extends ConfigurationProvider
    When implemented allows to alias already existing beans
